PluginList.Plugin: A plugin to record map snapshots during the MDS learning process.
A collection of metrics for binary data (e.g. Jacard, Tanimoto distances.) with support for sparse set encoding.
A collection of metrics for numerical data (e.g. harmonical mean, city-block distance.)
A collection of metrics for graph structural data (a la adjacency matrix imported from sdf files, metrics include shortest path distance, resistance distances.)
A collection of custom importers. Supported file formats: arff, cel, sdf, mol, fcs, mtx, mtx.gz and a configuable CSV format filter.
A set of wave transformations like Fourier and Wavelet transformations. See the help menu of VisuMap "About WaveTransforms" for more information after installed this plugin.
Multivariate analysis: LDA (linear discriminant analysis); PLS (partial least squares) and CCA (canonic correlation analysis.
A plugin to generates various kind of dataset for experimental purposes.
A plugin for data cleansing services.
Plugin for various services related to genetics. Imorter for fasta, fastq and beggraph files.
Data modeling with deep artificial neural networks. TensorFlow version 1.12 must be installed.
Services to facilitate single cell RNA sequence (scRNA-seq) analysis. Implements the SC.DualEmbedding and SC.DualCorrelation distances functions.
Scripts to create heatmap for single cell RNA expression data with dual sorting, mapping and clustering. The module also provides services to import Loom, H5, H5AD and MarketMatrix (mtx) files.
Scripts to create deep learning models for embedding and clustering. This plugin uses tensorflow library, and optionally CUDA/GPU services.
Plugin to help python programs to communicate with VisuMap. A numpy file importer is also included.
